scenario_text.value: Huh? What’s going on, Takuma?

I was looking for you guys, since you all
disappeared.

Well, we didn’t exactly coordinate anything.
Hmm... Maybe the others are in the woods?

I heard Agumon shouting and chasing
something...
Chasing...what?
Beats me!
Are you by yourself, Floramon?!
Hm? What’s it look like to you, Takuma?
It...looks like you’re on your own.

Aha, yes, how very observant. I came here all
by myself.
Hey, are you teasing me?
I don’t know, what do you think?

(Why do I feel like she’s not giving me
a straight answer? She’s so hard to read.)

(Could she be hiding something? Maybe she’s
a spy?)

(No, no, I can’t let myself start questioning
my friends. But...)
(I wonder what she’d say if I asked her.)
What are you doing?
Are you a spy?
Let’s head back.
What are you doing?
What are you doing out here all by yourself?

What? Can’t a girl have her privacy?
How dare you?!

Would you just give me a straight answer?
It’s a serious question.

You’re the one who decided to abandon the
group and go off on your own.

Honestly... You’re surprisingly uptight, you
know that?

Now, what was the question? What am I doing
out here? I’m...eating. Snacking? Hmm...

How to put this? I like bathing in sunlight,
and the air and soil are fresh here.

What? So...this is some kind of nature
therapy?

Yes! Nature therapy! That’s it! I was
recovering in the fresh air and sunlight.
Oh, is that all...
Um, I’m sorry. I shouldn’t have doubted you.

That’s all right. Besides, now you know
a little more about me.
Are you a spy?

Don’t tell me... Floramon, you’re not a spy,
are you?
Huh? What’s that?

Come to think of it, any of you could be
spies!

And who’s to say Aoi or Minoru or anyone else
isn’t colluding with the enemy?
Oh! So that’s what a spy is.

But if it’s true, and you’re a spy, I need to
act!
Wait, wait, stop! Don’t get so worked up!

Heheh, hahaha! You actually think I’d betray
Saki and the others? No way! Not a chance!
What? Really? You wouldn’t?

No! And it’s not just me. Agumon wouldn’t do
that, and neither would anyone else.

I can’t believe you would think that. Seems
like you really don’t get us yet, Takuma.

Oh, well, uh...sorry. I shouldn’t have jumped
to such a horrible conclusion about you.

Well, as long as you’ve learned your lesson,
I forgive you.
Let’s head back.

Well, I’m not sure what you’re doing here,
but let’s get back. Saki must be worried.
Oh, yes, let’s go. I’d hate to worry Saki.

Speaking of which... Did you come out here
looking for Agumon because you were worried?

Yeah, pretty much. Only I guess he’s not
here.

The two of you are so close. Couldn’t be more
different than Shuuji and Lopmon.

Yeah, I feel bad for Lopmon, but I can’t help
wondering...

If Shuuji’s so hard on him, why doesn’t he
just leave?

He couldn’t do that. As far as Lopmon is
concerned, Shuuji is irreplaceable.

It’s the same with me, and with Agumon too,
you know? You humans are special to us.
We’re...special?

Heheh, sounds like you still don’t really
understand us yet, Takuma.

Anyway, I’m all set now. I think I’ll head
back. You go on without me, Takuma.
You’ll be all right on your own?

Better than you will be. Besides, weren’t you
looking for Agumon?

Oh, right! You said you think he’s in the
forest? Thanks, I’ll check it out.
Take care!

Don’t worry, I’ll make it back just fine. You
should go find Agumon.
